Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.model.GameEntity
      • main.model.Character

  • @Entity
public class Character
extends GameEntity
    the characters in the world the player is able to interact with

      • giveItemToPlayer

        Handles transfer of item from character to player
        Returns:

      • isPossessedByCharacter

        public boolean isPossessedByCharacter(Item item)
        Checks if item is in possession character
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be checked
        Returns:
        If item is in possession of character then return = true, else return = false
